description: Creates an AWS re:Post Private private re:Post.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for the private re:Post. This must be unique in your account.

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain that you use to access your AWS re:Post Private private re:Post. All custom subdomains must be approved by AWS before use. In addition to your custom subdomain, all private re:Posts are issued an AWS generated subdomain for immediate use.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The list of tags associated with the private re:Post. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: tier
parameters.description: The pricing tier for the private re:Post.

nested_items.name: spaceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the private re:Post.
